meanings.definition: A benign tumor composed of muscle tissue.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the myoma in her uterus was not cancerous.
meanings.sent2: She felt relieved when the doctor confirmed that her myoma was not harmful.
meanings.sent3: The myoma in her abdomen decided to throw a party, but it was a very quiet affair.
meanings.sent4: Her myoma was like a tiny, harmless garden gnome sitting in her body.
meanings.sent5: The myoma in her body was as harmless as a fluffy cloud in the sky.

meanings.definition: A tumor composed of muscle tissue, especially one that is not malignant.
meanings.sent1: The ultrasound revealed a myoma in her abdomen that needed monitoring.
meanings.sent2: Her grandmother had a myoma in her arm that never caused any trouble.
meanings.sent3: The myoma in his leg thought it was a famous rock star, but it couldn't even play guitar.
meanings.sent4: The myoma in her body was like a quiet roommate who never caused any problems.
meanings.sent5: The myoma in her abdomen was as still and silent as a statue in a park.
